summary: A console code that will give you all skills to 100, level 81, all perks, some spells, armor, weapons and other useful stuff.
descriptionHtml:
Installation:
Add the MaxSet.txt file to your Skyrim/Data folder.

Use:
1. Open the console using the ` key
2. Type in: bat MaxSet
3. ???
4. Profit

Using the cheat will give you:

- Daedric Boots
- Daedric Gauntlets
- Daedric Shield
- Daedric Helmet
- Daedric Armor

- Konahrik (Mask)
- Gauldur Amulet
- Nightweavers Band

- Ultimate Health Potion 100x
- Ultimate Stamina Potion 100x
- Ultimate Magicka Potion 100x

- Daedric Sword 2x
- Daedric Dagger 2x
- Daedric War Axe 2X
- Daedric Mace 2x
- Daedric Bow 
- Daedric Greatsword
- Daedric Battleaxe
- Daedric Warhammer
- Daedric Arrow 1000x

- Ebony Ore 17x (To upgrade all the Daedric stuff to Flawless)
- Gold Ore (To upgrade the Konahrik to Flawless)

- Lockpick 1000x
- Gold 20000x

- Spell Tome: Fast Healing
- Spell Tome: Fireball

- Set Carry weight to 1000
- Set Health to 300
- Set Magicka to 300
- Set Stamina to 300
- Set Player level to 81
- Set all skills to 100
- Unlock all perks
author: PyroPowerZ
